item.title: 【PRORES HD】Harry Styles - As It Was (2022 (MASTER ProRes 2k)
item.description:
Hello, I am offering you the Original ProRes Master of the clip (Save Your Tears) from The Weekend, I noticed that the file was no longer available on ShareMania so I took the opportunity to repost it, I also re-encode the file in Hevc lossless, I posted several links which normally never expire but if one or more links break do not hesitate to let me know =)
